name: mongoose-test-marker
description: A Mongoose plugin for marking and cleaning up test records

scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover --report teamcity --report lcov _mocha -- --ui bdd --check-leaks --recursive --slow 200 --reporter spec test
scripts.coveralls: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --recursive -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Springworks
